content: संवृत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Covered, covered up: मुहुरंगुलिसंवृताधरोष्ठं (मुखं) <ls>Ś. 3. 25</ls> {@--2@} Hidden, concealed; न मदनो विवृतो न च संवृतः <ls>Ś. 2. 11.</ls> {@--3@} Secret. {@--4@} Closed, shut up, secured. {@--5@} Retired, secluded. {@--6@} Contracted, compressed. {@--7@} Confiscated, sequestered. {@--8@} Encompassed, surrounded. {@--9@} Filled with, full of. {@--10@} Accompanied by; see वृ with सं. --तं {@--1@} A secret or retired place, secrecy. {@--2@} A mode of pronunciation.
